intro: Pyrola elegantula var. jiangxiensis, commonly known as the Jiangxi snowbell, is a rare evergreen herbaceous plant native to China. It belongs to the Ericaceae family and is characterized by its low-growing habit and clustered foliage. The plant produces showy, bell-shaped white flowers that bloom in early spring. It thrives in shaded, moist environments and is often found in mountainous regions with acidic soils. Due to its limited distribution and habitat specificity, it is considered a vulnerable species.
